text: This was pulled of by German General Erwin Rommel. He used it successfully at the Battle of Gazala, which led to his capture of Tobruk in 1941. Battle Category:Battles involving France Category:Battles involving Germany Category:Battles involving India Category:Battles involving Italy Category:Battles involving South Africa Category:Battles involving the United Kingdom Category:North African battles of World War II Battle
title: Battle of Gazala
